yacl.customdurability.title: Custom Durability
yacl.customdurability.armor_is_durabilit:
Whether Armor Durabilities should be multiplied using the Default Vanilla Multipliers.

Default Multipliers:
§7Helmet: §a11
§7Chestplate: §a16
§7Leggings: §a15
§7Boots: §a13

§fFor Example; The Durability of Boot Armors would be §c13 * Durability§f.
yacl.customdurability.overrides.label: Durability Overrides
yacl.customdurability.overrides.descript:
Add Custom Durabilities for items!

§cHas to be in the format of §8'§7key;durability§8'§c.

§aAccepts Item Tags!
